ai_sprite.name: guard
ai_sprite.dialog: We'll maintain and protect this city for you, sir!

ai_sprite.name: guard
ai_sprite.dialog: We'll maintain and protect this city for you, sir!

ai_sprite.name: guard
ai_sprite.dialog: What a bunch of brown nosers.

dialog.text: An epistle arrived from our chief judge. It reads: Will you retake our cities to the west first, or the east first?
